mds-cashbook-analytic
=====================
Tryton module to add analytic-accounts to cashbook

Install
=======

pip install mds-cashbook-analytic

Requires
========
- Tryton 6.0

Changes
=======

*6.0.8 - 01.12.2023*

- add: add analytic-line to cashbook-side of account-move

*6.0.7 - 24.10.2023*

- fix: use debit/credit from move-line

*6.0.6 - 25.07.2023*

- optimized code

*6.0.5 - 05.06.2023*

- optimized code

*6.0.4 - 14.02.2023*

- fix: columns

*6.0.3 - 30.09.2022*

- updt: parameter

*6.0.2 - 07.09.2022*

- updt: permissions

*6.0.1 - 05.09.2022*

- works

*6.0.0 - 05.09.2022*

- init
